name: ghostwriting

the activity of writing books, articles, etc. for another person to publish under their own name: Ghostwriting has come under intense criticism recently. In a practice known as ghostwriting, drug makers hire professional writers to compose scientific papers and then recruit well-known doctors to list themselves as the author. Synonym
ghosting
